tk.hugo4715.learn4j.classifier.perceptron

Class PerceptronClassifier<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.hugo4715.learn4j.classifier.perceptron.PerceptronClassifier<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The label type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<T>

    public class PerceptronClassifier<T>
extends Object
implements Classifier<T>
    This classifier is a Perceptron Classifier, linear binary classifier:
    - binary => it can only be used with 2 labels
    - linear => series are separated with a line
    See Also:
    Wikipedia Page

      • classify

        public Map<Label<T>,Double> classify(double[] point)
        Description copied from interface: Classifier
        Classify a new point using this classifier
        Specified by:
        classify in interface Classifier<T>
        Parameters:
        point - The point
        Returns:
        A map of labels, with the associated probabilities If the classifier is not fuzzy, the map values are only 1 and 0 There is no obligation to return label with a probability of 0
